frontmatter.title: AWS Relational Database Service
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for AWS Relational Database Service
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Amazon RDS integrates with AWS Config to support compliance and enhance security by recording and auditing changes to the configuration of your DB instance
Amazon Aurora supports quick, efficient cloning operations, where entire multi-terabyte database clusters can be cloned in minutes.
Amazon RDS provides Amazon CloudWatch metrics for your database instances at no additional charge.
